metadata.title: CVE-2020-11879 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GNOME Evolution before 3.35.91. By using theproprietary (non-RFC6068) "mailto?attach=..." parameter, a website (orother source of mailto links) can make Evolution attach local files ordirectories to a composed email message without showing a warning to theuser, as demonstrated by an attach=. value.

criterions.comment: evolution package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
